data.title: Smells Good but Won't Last 24hrs
data.body:
Dr. Squatch Natural Deodorant for Men in the Alpine Sage + Fresh Falls scent is a refreshing departure from traditional deodorants. The scent is invigorating and truly captures the essence of the great outdoors, making it a pleasure to apply each morning.

One of the standout features of this deodorant is its aluminum-free formula, which is a huge plus for those looking to avoid potentially harmful ingredients. Knowing that I'm using a product with natural ingredients gives me peace of mind.

However, while the scent is fantastic, I did notice that the longevity of the deodorant falls short compared to traditional options. It seems to require reapplication throughout the day to maintain effectiveness, especially during strenuous activities or hot weather.

Despite this drawback, I appreciate the efforts of Dr. Squatch to provide a natural alternative to mainstream deodorants. The packaging is sleek and environmentally friendly, and the product itself feels gentle on the skin without any irritation.

Overall, if you're willing to sacrifice a bit of longevity for the benefits of a natural, aluminum-free formula, Dr. Squatch Natural Deodorant is worth a try. Just be prepared to reapply as needed throughout the day to stay fresh
